Hand

      Hand BlackJack.dealerPlays()
      dealerPlays method - adds cards to the dealer's hand until the value is bigger or equals 16

      bust method - tests a given player's hand to see if they have gone over 21

      handValue method - returns the value of the given player's hand
      Card BlackJack.hit(Hand whohit)
      hit method - adds the next random card from the deck to the given player's hand
